display_long_description:
# *THE #1 VR SOCIAL COLLECTIBLE CARD GAME IS FREE TO PLAY!*
Collect **HUNDREDS OF CARDS**, compete in **EPIC PVP & PVE BATTLES**, and explore our **IMMERSIVE FANTASY HAVENS** which feels like playing cards at your local game shop!
[media]
# Unsure About Card Battlers but Love Strategy Games?
Cards & Tankards now has strategy board games you can play with your friends like **CHESS & CHECKERS** with more planned for future updates!
[media]
# Cracking Packs Has Never Been More Fun!
Experience the thrill of opening booster packs with friends, all without spending a dime! Unlike other CCGs, Cards & Tankards is built around a true **FREE-TO-PLAY** experience.
[media]
# Become The Best in the World!
Compete in the **RANKED ARENA** to become a Master of Cards & Tankards and have your username featured on the **GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS!**
[media]
# New to CCGs? No Problem!
Cards & Tankards is **EASY TO LEARN**, with friendly players always eager to teach you the basics, share more complex strategies, and raise a tankard to your first victory!
[media]

# *THE #1 VR SOCIAL COLLECTIBLE CARD GAME IS FREE TO PLAY!*
Collect **HUNDREDS OF CARDS**, compete in **EPIC PVP & PVE BATTLES**, and explore our **IMMERSIVE FANTASY HAVENS** which feels like playing cards at your local game shop!

# Unsure About Card Battlers but Love Strategy Games?
Cards & Tankards now has strategy board games you can play with your friends like **CHESS & CHECKERS** with more planned for future updates!
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491822897_2207211333017644_8618162970932046056_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=bqBcJB68ohIQ7kNvwHZpmzw&_nc_oc=Adlrz1s4e12x3eoOkvIRccmcqVcDckbeUDEXMgvCtv3Btfyz_1vJSkIxo-gX-ZqMWwo&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=lznfaEIV9evjJT7abeokcA&oh=00_AfvuBsHZXXygOb-ZKMvQG20mu2MPpX0zmifbmmaa5v-Vzw&oe=6989ECE1)
# Cracking Packs Has Never Been More Fun!
Experience the thrill of opening booster packs with friends, all without spending a dime! Unlike other CCGs, Cards & Tankards is built around a true **FREE-TO-PLAY** experience.
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499292712_2011949136257433_2240288442270214956_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=yLpwDDMcWaIQ7kNvwFwQsIH&_nc_oc=AdlblYFBaST7Vet971E3dQx9hUewyL_OGrGnasZf5QPtzd0YAz8v5NDlSc1zRZkPZ_8&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=lznfaEIV9evjJT7abeokcA&oh=00_AftO6zUpep-n3AM2Vv51FMfZF9NpnWWSPTCmidW66bufEQ&oe=6989E389)
# Become The Best in the World!
Compete in the **RANKED ARENA** to become a Master of Cards & Tankards and have your username featured on the **GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS!**
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/507828918_1952193972016857_1573896307480103320_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=uTBxk3Tt0yoQ7kNvwGrn1I9&_nc_oc=AdllWgRW4KzTL5GGhH7YTF7n49AMS7dnUkIdbQAgQWmh87pSQzwO0YP4G7eiAsT0V6o&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=lznfaEIV9evjJT7abeokcA&oh=00_Aftz0tZB_uFkrHcoAcpGIGNZORy2SQNeb0HbIvFD4vxH8g&oe=6989EC12)
# New to CCGs? No Problem!
Cards & Tankards is **EASY TO LEARN**, with friendly players always eager to teach you the basics, share more complex strategies, and raise a tankard to your first victory!
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491822813_1735619753788707_6789934812689609528_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=odRgjb5In68Q7kNvwE34NyM&_nc_oc=AdlFIzv35lPsyMKCYozEZGwQkv8Ri6OxEMxFZkKrxY4wJiVajmLMGDXWb_sk_s41CMc&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=lznfaEIV9evjJT7abeokcA&oh=00_AftMgTG64kliyUO6rBuFwqI8CauLo6ZKNil4EW_LnA1s1w&oe=698A1198)
